name: Polus.gg
description:
Welcome Crew!


Polus.gg is a mod of the hit indie game Among Us.

It aims to add features on top of the base game, such as:
  • a revamped account system
  • entirely new cosmetics and cosmetic types
  • new game modes
  • new roles
  • and lots more to come!
It requires you to own and install Among Us first.

Some of our existing and in-development game modes are,

Town of Polus

Adding boatloads of new roles, Town of Polus gives to many entirely new ways to play Among Us for those who desire a heavily modded experience
Town of Polus adds dozens of new roles, some of them being:
  • Jester - Trick the crew into believing you're the impostor
  • Grenadier - Use flashbangs to blind the crewmates
  • Oracle - Enchant a player and predict their role
  • Engineer - Maintain the outpost, and help out the crew

Hide and Seek

For those looking for a new way to play without too much frills on top, Hide and Seek provides simple yet fun gameplay.
